languages.text: {n}Толпа замирает. Священное обещание смерти заставляет каждого вспомнить, сколь бесценен дар жизни.{/n}
{n}The crowd falls silent as the sacred promise of death reminds them just how precious the gift of life is.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Толпа замирает. Священное обещание смерти заставляет каждого вспомнить, сколь бесценен дар жизни.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The crowd goes still. The sacred promise of death makes everyone remember how precious the gift of life is.{/n}
{n}The crowd goes still. The sacred promise of death makes everyone remember how precious the gift of life is.{/n}
{n}The crowd falls silent as the sacred promise of death reminds them just how precious the gift of life is.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Menge verstummt, als das heilige Todesversprechen sie daran erinnert, wie wertvoll das Geschenk des Lebens ist.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The crowd falls silent as the sacred promise of death reminds them just how precious the gift of life is.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Menge verstummt, als das heilige Todesversprechen sie daran erinnert, wie wertvoll das Geschenk des Lebens ist.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La multitud guarda silencio: la sagrada promesa de la muerte le ha recordado lo preciado que es el don de la vida.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The crowd falls silent as the sacred promise of death reminds them just how precious the gift of life is.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La multitud guarda silencio: la sagrada promesa de la muerte le ha recordado lo preciado que es el don de la vida.{/n}

languages.text: {n}死という神聖な約束を目の当たりにして、命という贈り物がいかに尊いものか頭をよぎり、群衆は静まり返った。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The crowd falls silent as the sacred promise of death reminds them just how precious the gift of life is.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}死という神聖な約束を目の当たりにして、命という贈り物がいかに尊いものか頭をよぎり、群衆は静まり返った。{/n}

languages.text: {n}当死亡的神圣承诺敲醒了这些人，让他们意识到生命的礼物何其珍贵时，所有人都陷入了沉默。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The crowd falls silent as the sacred promise of death reminds them just how precious the gift of life is.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}当死亡的神圣承诺敲醒了这些人，让他们意识到生命的礼物何其珍贵时，所有人都陷入了沉默。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La foule se tait brusquement lorsque la promesse sacrée de la mort lui rappelle à quel point le don de la vie est précieux.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The crowd falls silent as the sacred promise of death reminds them just how precious the gift of life is.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kalabalık, kutsal ölüm sözünün kendilerine hayatın ne kadar kıymetli bir hediye olduğunu hatırlatması üzerine sükûnete bürünüyor.{/n}
